title: In dire need of help - Client Problems
body:
Today, idk what happened to my client but i cant click the "Play" button. It stays gray and cannot be clicked even though i've waited for around 10 mins ( This happened several times in the past but in 10-20 sec it goes back to normal ). Screenshot link below ( somehow i cant use imgur sorry )

tinypic.com/r/vze9ef/9

Is there anyone that is having this problem too ? Do anyone know how to resolve this ?

Thanks.

replies.body: When your play button suddenly dims out and you're not able to click it, it typically means that your network is having a hard time connection to our matchmaking servers. Look over our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure you're keeping a stable connection with our servers.
